ygData.subject: Re: Looking for lvl9 party for exp and cash
ygData.msgSnippet: Freddy, more motivation for you to play your Necro. At level 49, pets dual weild and double attack for 4 X 60dmg ever 2 sec with a pair of combine/fine steel
ygData.messageBody:
Freddy, more motivation for you to play your Necro. At level 49, pets dual weild
and double attack for 4 X 60dmg ever 2 sec with a pair of combine/fine steel
daggers

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> would like to hunt with u... BUT... i have only one level 22 char and the
> rest all level 1-3... and i dont play during weekdays... cannot help u out
> on this one... maybe u can check out Nalfien... hes around that level i
> think... or maybe pass that level liaoz... hehe...
>
> nic
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Kah Wai <kwchow@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 6:17 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Looking for lvl9 party for exp and cash
>
> > From: "Kah Wai" <kwchow@...>
> >
> > 9th Order sounds good too...
> >
> > So far still no response for hunting, seems like only the regular high
> level
> > players posting left right center.... come on the rest of you! If there
> are
> > any .... hehe
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 5:02 PM
> > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Looking for lvl9 party for exp and cash
> >
> >
> > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > >
> > > Order........
> > >
> > > Kah Wai wrote:
> > >
> > > > From: "Kah Wai" <kwchow@...>
> > > >
> > > > Well, just trying to do some role playing here..hehe
> > > >
> > > > I mean lvl actually, anyway for a Bard every level gets a new
> song/spell
> > :)
> > > >
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > > Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 11:16 AM
> > > > Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Looking for lvl9 party for exp and cash
> > > >
> > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > Err u guys know the difference between circle and lvl? Circle is
> the
> > time
> > > > > you get new skills or spells, eg circle 1 for wiz is lvl 1, but
> circle
> > 2
> > > > > mean lvl 4, circle 3 is lvl 8. Level is the normal xp lvl u gain
> one
> > by
> > > > > one.
> > > > >
> > > > > When u say u are a circle 9, I presume u are close to lvl 40, hehe.
> > Lvl
> > > > 40
> > > > > no need to hunt in LF la, too small fry for u ;)
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > On Tuesday, 17 August, 1999 10:02 AM, kwchow@...
> > > > > [SMTP:kwchow@...] wrote:
> > > > > > From: kwchow@...
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Melodeuss, Bard of 9th circle:
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Am looking for party of similar lvl to hunt in LFay Bandit camps
> > > > tonight,
> > > > > need to make some dough and gain some exp. Will probably have to
> start
> > at
> > > > > about 11pm there abouts, anyone interested?
